reviews.review_msg: He is GREAT! Never ever bored in lectures - they are fascinating and super interesting! His cases are not contemporary, but from the early 2000's (perhaps that will change with the revolutions). Tough course, but SO worth it!

Really great professor. Though I had no knowledge of this course's material I ended up learning so much. The book/course guide are comprehensible, though there is a lot of reading. If you do readings and attend class you will definitely do well
